posts.content: can anyone tell me where i can buy the concertina hose thingy that comes out of a splitty heat exchanger,and where i can buy a rubber floor mat for the rear of my kombi?

I've got a rubber floor mat, pm me your email if your interested I'll send you a pic.
Ben

Not sure if this is correct as I haven't had time to check it out yet but I picked up some of the bay window pipes which go from the heat exchangers at DubFreeze and asked if they would be suitable. The chap told me that beetle ones were the sort i was after but that depended upon some small section of pipe being available to where it attaches to the bus. Totally useless post at the moment I appreciate as I haven't had time to check it out but if someone else reads this and knows maybe they could confirm it for you/us.

RD
I've also heard bug ones work, though not sure from which model...
I've used 60mm pre heat pipe from local motor factors and it works fine apart from all the bits of stuff flying in cab when reved (pipes not connected for 5years)
